Section 2: 2.10, 2.11, 2.12, 2.13.

Section 3: 3.17.

Section 4: 4.11, 4.16, 4.17, 4.18, 4.19, 4.21, 4.23, 4.24, 4.25, 4.26, 4.28, 4.29, 4.30, 4.31, 4.32, 4.33. 

Section 5: 5.1, 5.2, 5.3, 5.4, 5.5, 5.6, 5.7, 5.8, 5.9, 5.10, 5.11, 5.12, 5.13, 5.18, 5.19, 5.20, 5.21, 5.22, 5.25, 5.26, 5.27, 5.28, 5.29, 5.30.

Section 6: 6.1, 6.2, 6.3, 6.4, 6.5, 6.6, 6.7, 6.8, 6.9, 6.10, 6.11, 6.12, 6.13, 6.15.

Section 12: 12.1, 12.3, 12.4, 12.5, 12.6, 12.7, 12.8, 12.9, 12.10, 12.11, 12.12, 12.13, 12.14, 12.15, 12.16, 12.17, 12.18, 12.19, 12.20, 12.21, 12.23, 12.24, 12.25, 12.26, 12.27, 12.28, 12.29, 12.30, 12.31, 12.32, 12.33, 12.34, 12.35, 12.36, 12.37, 12.38, 12.39.
